BIO

Hi, I am a front-end web developer who focuses on Typescript, ReactJS, Redux, React Query, Material-UI. I also have backend knowledge about NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, GraphQL. I am looking for a job as a Junior Web Developer. Welcome to my Porfolio!
